long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Studeo chrome extension allows you to access your Storybooks easily while not in the Studeo platform, as well as allowing you to record multiple video introductions that will appear on any of your Storybooks, personalizing them for specific audiences or even individuals. 

Studeo represents the state of the art in digital interactive storytelling, using editorial design to seamlessly blend assets such as video, images, text and more without requiring any coding or design expertise. Our extension streamlines access to a user's Storybooks created within our application, and for the first time, provides an opportunity to easily record a personalized video introduction linked to a Storybook (further elevating the storytelling experience that Studeo provides).
